market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Valuation initiation form, sale deed, house plan permission, municipal tax receipt, utility bill.
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located at Plot No. 177, Green Villas, Road No. 5, Survey No. 277, Ameenpur Village, Sangareddy District.
• As per the copy of sale deed, the land area for the subject property was identified as 134 sq yd or 1,206 sq.ft.
• The total built-up area as per the sale deed is 2,100 sq.ft. (Ground floor: 1,050 sq.ft., First floor: 1,050 sq.ft.).
• The property is within a well-developed residential locality with good infrastructure and clean surroundings.
• The property is currently self-occupied by the owner as per municipal tax receipt and utility bills.
• No negative area features like garbage dumps or slums were observed in the vicinity.
• Property is easy to identify with clear boundaries and nearby Green Villas landmark.
• The property has two floors (Ground + 1 Floor), with 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 2 halls, 2 kitchens, and 2 other rooms.
• No significant deviations in area between planned and actual as per available documentation.
• The blueprint indicates the presence of a balcony and no other significant projections.
• For the purpose of this value assessment, it is assumed that the property has a clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 10 June 2024 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 10 June 2024 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
